hero.title: Family-Crafted Waterproof Bathroom Furniture
hero.subtitle: A family-owned factory specializing in 100% waterproof PVC bathroom furniture. Custom designs, bulk orders, and made-to-measure solutions available.

features.title: Why Choose Our PVC Bathroom Furniture
features.subtitle: Discover the advantages of our premium waterproof furniture collection, designed specifically for the challenging bathroom environment.

waterproof.title: 100% Waterproof
waterproof.description: Our PVC furniture is completely impervious to water, eliminating warping, swelling, or damage from moisture.

durable.title: Durable Construction
durable.description: Engineered to withstand the demanding bathroom environment with exceptional longevity and stability.

premium.title: Premium Finishes
premium.description: Beautiful, high-end finishes that perfectly mimic natural materials without their inherent vulnerabilities.

maintenance.title: Low Maintenance
maintenance.description: Easy to clean surfaces that resist stains, mold, and mildew for hassle-free maintenance.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Materials
sustainable.description: Eco-friendly construction using recyclable materials and sustainable manufacturing processes.

designer.title: Designer Options
designer.description: Available in a variety of contemporary styles, colors, and finishes to match any bathroom aesthetic.

about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: A legacy of innovation in waterproof bathroom furniture since 2005

history.title: Our Story
history.content1: Welcome to Siena Home, where expertise meets innovation in the realm of 100% waterproof bathroom furniture. With more than two decades of dedicated experience, first as a plywood and chipboard bathroom furniture factory to revolutionary moisture, splash and water resistant bathroom furniture!
history.content2: In the last year, we have invested in the most modern machines and materials, which means that we use the most modern technique. Our wide portfolio boasts a diverse range of products tailored to suit every taste and requirement.

milestones.foundingDesc: Started as a small family workshop specializing in traditional bathroom furniture
milestones.expansionDesc: Expanded operations and introduced waterproof PVC technology
milestones.modernizationDesc: Invested in state-of-the-art machinery and sustainable practices

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: Each design is carefully crafted to not only withstand the humidity in the bathroom but also enhance the aesthetic appeal of the space.

sustainability.title: Environmental Responsibility
sustainability.description: Siena Home is a socially responsible company that uses materials that do not pollute the environment!

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly invest in modern technology and techniques to deliver the best products to our customers.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our products or want to schedule a consultation? Reach out to us.

factory.title: Factory
factory.description: Our main production facility where all furniture is manufactured

showroom_kavadarci.description: Visit our Kavadarci showroom to see our products in person

showroom_skopje.title: Showroom - Skopje
showroom_skopje.description: Our Skopje showroom featuring the complete product range

gallery.title: Inspiration Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore beautiful bathroom transformations featuring our waterproof PVC furniture.

products.title: Our Collection
products.subtitle: Explore our range of premium waterproof PVC bathroom furniture, designed for style and durability.

modern_vanity.description: A sleek, wall-mounted vanity unit with double sinks and ample storage space. Made from high-quality waterproof PVC.

storage_cabinet.description: A versatile bathroom storage cabinet with adjustable shelves and moisture-resistant finish.

floating_shelf.description: Set of three floating shelves perfect for displaying décor or storing bathroom essentials.

compact_vanity.description: Space-saving vanity unit perfect for small bathrooms with integrated sink and storage.

shower_caddy.description: Corner shower caddy with multiple shelves, made from waterproof PVC with chrome accents.

mirror_cabinet.description: Modern mirror cabinet with integrated LED lighting and defogging technology.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for all your bathroom furniture needs, from design to installation.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Highest quality materials and craftsmanship in every project

time.title: On-Time Delivery
time.description: Reliable delivery schedules you can count on

experience.title: 20+ Years Experience
experience.description: Decades of expertise in bathroom furniture manufacturing

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Dedicated customer support throughout your project

custom.title: Custom Made-to-Measure Solutions
custom.description: Transform your unique vision into reality with our bespoke bathroom furniture service. Every piece is crafted specifically for your space and requirements.

features.materials: Choice of premium waterproof PVC materials

bulk.title: Bulk Manufacturing for Businesses
bulk.description: Perfect for contractors, developers, and businesses requiring large quantities. We offer competitive pricing and consistent quality for bulk orders.

features.volume: Minimum order quantities starting from 50 units
features.timeline: Flexible production schedules to meet deadlines

consultation.title: Expert Design Consultation
consultation.description: Work with our design experts to create the perfect bathroom layout. We provide professional advice on space optimization and product selection.

features.planning: Comprehensive space planning and layout design
features.recommendations: Product recommendations based on your needs

design.title: 3D Design & Visualization
design.description: See your bathroom transformation before it happens. Our 3D design service helps you visualize the final result and make informed decisions.

delivery.title: Nationwide Delivery & Logistics
delivery.description: Reliable delivery service across the country. We ensure your furniture arrives safely and on schedule, with full tracking and insurance.

features.nationwide: Delivery to all major cities and regions

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Contact our team today to discuss your bathroom furniture needs. We're here to help you create the perfect solution for your space.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Siena Home, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us in any way.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.content: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

items.communication: Communicating with you about products and services
items.improvement: Improving our website and customer experience

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

items.service: To trusted service providers who assist us in operating our business
items.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights
items.business: In connection with a business transfer or merger

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for the website to function properly

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.delete: Right to request deletion of your data

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By using our website and services, you agree to these terms.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service govern your use of the Siena Home website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our website, products, or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. This agreement applies to:

items.purchase: Purchasing products or services from us
items.communication: Communicating with us through any channel

products.title: Products and Services
products.content: Siena Home specializes in manufacturing and selling waterproof PVC bathroom furniture. Our services include:

custom.title: Custom Orders
custom.content: Made-to-measure bathroom furniture designed specifically for your space and requirements.

bulk.title: Bulk Manufacturing
bulk.content: Large quantity orders for contractors, developers, and commercial clients.

installation.title: Installation Services
installation.content: Professional installation by our certified technicians with warranty coverage.

orders.title: Orders and Payment
orders.content: When you place an order with us, the following terms apply:

items.confirmation: All orders are subject to acceptance and confirmation by Siena Home
items.payment: Payment is required before production begins for custom orders
items.pricing: Prices are subject to change without notice until order confirmation
items.cancellation: Custom orders cannot be cancelled once production has begun

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content: We provide delivery services with the following conditions:

items.timeframes: Delivery timeframes are estimates and not guaranteed
items.costs: Shipping costs are calculated based on size, weight, and destination
items.risk: Risk of loss transfers to you upon delivery
items.inspection: You must inspect items upon delivery and report any damage immediately

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content: Our return policy is designed to ensure customer satisfaction while protecting our business interests:

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.timeframe: Returns must be initiated within 14 days of delivery
conditions.condition: Items must be in original condition and packaging
conditions.custom: Custom-made items are not eligible for return unless defective
conditions.approval: All returns require prior approval from our customer service team

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on our website, including designs, logos, text, images, and software, is the property of Siena Home and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Siena Home shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our products or services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for the specific product or service.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of North Macedonia. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our services shall be resolved in the courts of North Macedonia.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

warranty.title: Product Warranty
warranty.subtitle: We stand behind the quality of our products with comprehensive warranty coverage for your peace of mind.

protection.title: Comprehensive Protection
protection.description: Full coverage against manufacturing defects and material failures

duration.title: Extended Duration
duration.description: Industry-leading warranty periods for all our products

coverage.title: Wide Coverage
coverage.description: Covers materials, workmanship, and hardware components

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Dedicated warranty support team for quick resolution

overview.title: Warranty Overview
overview.content: Siena Home provides comprehensive warranty coverage for all our waterproof PVC bathroom furniture. This warranty demonstrates our confidence in the quality and durability of our products and ensures your investment is protected.

coverage.title: What's Covered
coverage.content: Our warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship under normal use conditions:

standard.title: Standard Warranty
standard.content: 5 years comprehensive coverage for all residential bathroom furniture products from date of purchase.

extended.title: Commercial Warranty
extended.content: 3 years coverage for commercial and high-use applications with different terms and conditions.

claims.title: How to Make a Warranty Claim
claims.content: If you experience any issues covered under warranty, follow these steps:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Reach out to our warranty department with your purchase details and description of the issue.

documentation.title: Provide Documentation
documentation.content: Submit photos of the issue, proof of purchase, and any relevant installation documentation.

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.content: Our technical team will evaluate your claim and determine the appropriate resolution.

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.content: We will repair, replace, or provide credit for covered warranty issues at our discretion.

care.title: Maintaining Your Warranty
care.content: To ensure your warranty remains valid, please follow these care instructions:

items.cleaning: Clean regularly with mild soap and water only
items.chemicals: Avoid harsh chemicals, abrasives, or bleach-based cleaners
items.installation: Ensure proper installation by qualified professionals
items.maintenance: Perform regular maintenance as recommended in product manuals

limitations.title: Warranty Limitations
limitations.content: This warranty is limited to repair or replacement of defective products. Siena Home is not liable for consequential damages, installation costs, or other indirect expenses. This warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser.

contact.title: Warranty Support
contact.content: For warranty claims or questions about coverage, contact our dedicated warranty team:
contact.hours: Warranty support available Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
